channel.title: Development on My digital journey
channel.description: Recent content in Development on My digital journey

item.title: Azure OpenAI Assistant
item.description: OpenAI is the next shiny thing I’ve been following OpenAI developement closely ever since its inception. I was a bit hesitant on upgrading, fearing I wouldn’t use its full potential (Also I’m quite frugal…😏). Fortunately there’s also a pay-as-you-go plan for using the API directly. This gives you more control on your credits. When Microsoft announced their version, I was excited about it, as I’m always in Azure. I also have a monthly credit to spend.
